reg:regulation.reg:title: Provincial Sales Tax Exemption and Refund Regulation
reg:regulation.reg:amsincluded: [Last amended July 1, 2023 by B.C. Reg. 128/2023 and includes amendments by B.C. Reg. 165/2023]

bcl:schedule.bcl:schedulesubtitle: Tangible Personal Property for Farm Purpose

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Bee cages, queen bee cups for grafting bees and queen bee mailing cartons or boxes
Containers obtained for use for packaging honey for marketing
Foundations designed for use in beekeeping
Frames and end bars designed for use in beekeeping
Sections designed for use by beekeepers
Staples and eyelets advertised or marketed for use in beekeeping
Wire and wiring tack for frames designed for use in beekeeping

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Bulk milk tanks, including tanks obtained for use for shipping milk
Milking machines, including any motors and pumps

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Chick boxes and staples obtained for use for chick boxes
C-K-A Gene Chick treatment in mash
Poultry feeders, waterers, troughs and coordinated cage systems obtained for use in conjunction with poultry feeders, waterers and troughs
Poultry laying cages if integrated with poultry feeding, watering and egg gathering systems

bcl:centertext.in:strong: Table 4 — Fencing, Gates, Pens, Stalls and Cages

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Automatic door closures designed for holding animals in stalls
Crop protection netting systems that enclose a crop to protect the crop from predators
Devices and equipment designed to restrain or hold livestock for the purposes of servicing, branding, testing or treatment
Electric fencing and batteries obtained for use for electric fencing
Gates and gate accessories designed for farm use
Head gates and nose bars designed as accessories to devices and equipment described in item 8 of this table
Insulators and insulated handles designed for electric fences
J Bolts obtained for use for electric fences
Prefabricated livestock loading chutes and handling systems
Rubber mats designed for use in livestock stalls
Staples obtained for use for fencing
Wire and netting obtained for use for fences
Wire mesh obtained for use for cages

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Adhesive pest management materials, including barriers, strips, insect trap coating, bird repellent and glue trap coating
Dusters, sprayers and applicators designed to dispense fertilizers, pesticides and insecticides
Insecticide, fungicide, disinfectant or weed control chemicals registered under the Pest Control Products Act (Canada)
Livestock protectors designed to be attached to livestock to keep predators and pests away
Naturally occurring predators and parasites obtained for use as biological control agents to control specific insect, mite or weed species

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Incineration units obtained for on-farm use
Treatment products obtained for on-farm use to promote the decay of organic materials in water in ponds, dug-outs and reservoirs
Treatment products obtained for use to reduce gas and bacteria levels in litters, bedding and manure

bcl:centertext.in:strong: Table 7 — Greenhouses, Nurseries and Mushroom Houses

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Artificial lighting systems obtained for use in greenhouses to promote plant growth, including replacement bulbs obtained for use in such lighting systems
Automatic product handling and packaging systems that place seedlings or cuttings in plastic wrap or other containers
Automatic travelling sprinklers designed for use in greenhouses
Carbon dioxide condensers and heat exchangers obtained for use as part of a greenhouse heating system
Cloches, including hot caps and hot tents
Conveyor belts designed to transport pots in nurseries
Glass that is designed for use in greenhouses, has a light transmission value of at least 89% and is obtained in quantities of at least 500 m2
Greenhouse and nursery boilers obtained for use in providing heat for a greenhouse or nursery
Mushroom bin loaders and unloaders, including the reel, pump and screen systems
Natural gas heating systems obtained for use in providing heat for a greenhouse or nursery
Plastic or polyethylene sheets that are heavy gauge, UV stabilized and obtained in rolls at least 100 feet in length and 20 feet in width
Polycarbonate panels that are obtained for use in greenhouses and are obtained in quantities of at least 500 m2
Thermal curtains, including hardware that operates the thermal curtain, obtained for use in greenhouses to retain heat
Tree diggers designed for use in nursery operations

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Drinking cups designed for use in fur farming
Feed mixers and feed mixer wagons
Feeders and feeding systems designed for livestock, automatic or manual, including controls and any integrated hardware or software
Feeding dishes designed for use in fur farming
Food grinders designed for use in fur farming
Minerals, medications, nutrients and micronutrients obtained for use for livestock
Mixers designed for use in fur farming
Water bowls designed to be attached to stanchions
Waterers and watering systems designed for livestock, automatic or manual, including controls and any integrated hardware or software

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Kerosene burners and other portable fuel-based burners

bcl:centertext.in:strong: Table 10 — Fertilizer, Chemicals and Chemical Equipment

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Chemicals obtained for use for making fertilizer
Sterilizing chemicals and sterilizing equipment, including electric soil sterilizers and steam generators obtained for use to sterilize soil

bcl:centertext.in:strong: Table 11 — Vehicles, Implements and Related Equipment

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Batteries, oil filters, sparkplugs and comparable engine parts, if obtained for use with tangible personal property described in this schedule
Buckets designed to be attached to front-end loaders
Farm implements designed to till the ground or harvest crops
Halters and harnesses designed for horses, including hardware
Hardware obtained for use for harnesses
Implements designed to be attached to a farm tractor
Pickups designed to be attached to a combine, hay loader or baler
Qualifying all-terrain vehicles that have an engine with a displacement of 200 cc or greater and that are equipped with a carrying rack, platform or cargo box
Skid steers and attachments designed to be attached to a skid steer
Telescopic handlers and attachments designed to be attached to a telescopic handler
Wagon boxes, tanks and other vehicles that are not self-propelled
Winches designed to be attached to a farm tractor

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Crop and farm product cleaning, sizing, grading and candling equipment and machines, including washers, brushers, baggers and dryers
Crop planting, harvesting and picking machinery and equipment
Culverts and other water-control devices designed for use in cranberry beds
Egg beaters designed for use by cranberry farmers
Elevating towers designed for use for pruning, thinning, picking or wiring trees
Hay conditioners and hay drying equipment
Refrigeration equipment obtained for use for the cooling or cold storage of farm products
Self-contained dryers designed for drying agricultural produce, including grain or nuts
Storage tanks, in industrial use sizes, obtained for use for storing fuel, liquid fertilizer, manure and similar items
Thermometers, hydrometers, barometers and other climatic and wind monitoring equipment and accessories, but not including any related computer hardware or software
Wind machines designed for use outdoors to prevent frost damage to crops

bcl:centertext.in:strong: Table 13 — Hand Tools, Ties and Stakes

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Bale ties and wire, including hay baling twine and wire
Pruning shears and clippers, including pneumatic pruning shears and clippers, but not including air compressors
Stakes, posts and poles designed to support crops or trees, including related ties and clips

oasis:line.in:strong: Item
Tangible personal property for farm purpose

oasis:entry.oasis:line: Animals, of a kind the products of which ordinarily constitute food for human consumption
Containers obtained for use for packaging fruits, vegetables, flowers, plants, nursery stock and other similar products for marketing
Horses, other than race horses and equestrian horses

Livestock identification tags, including microchips obtained for use for attachment to livestock for electronic livestock monitoring, whether or not the tags are impregnated with insecticides or pesticides
Sand obtained for use for livestock bedding
Slicers designed for use by fur farmers
Veterinary supplies, including insemination equipment, calf pullers, castration equipment, debeakers, dehorners, dilators, medication, restraints, sterilization equipment and syringes
